name: hookup
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the connection between a supply of something and its user, or a connection between two or more pieces of equipment: Each campsite has complete electric, water, and sewage hookups. Millions were watching via a satellite hookup.
Add to word list
Add to word list
IT, INTERNET a connection between two or more things, places, or people, using electronic equipment: a computer/internet/satellite hookup
